1000111100110000 0111011011101101 0 -> sum: 0000011000011101, cout: 1
1101110101000011 0100010101010010 0 -> sum: 0010001010010101, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
